description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Chicago 2016
http://gotochgo.com

Fred George - Early Adopter of OO & Agile, Advocating MicroServices & Programmer Anarchy

ABSTRACT
Approaches to MicroServices are almost as varied as the number of companies attempting an implementation. The promise is truly a siren song [...] 
Download slides and read the full abstract here:

title: GOTO 2016 • The Entity Microservice Trap You May Be Doing It Wrong • Fred George
